backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence for build tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Defines OKLCH-based theme variables and global styles for background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML with root div and script loading the React main file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout wrapping home and privacy policy pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with current year, game names, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with links to Home and Privacy Policy using lucide icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances using identity-aware React Query logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication and identity lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query backend hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, purple OKLCH theme, and fixed swirl background image behind all pages.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero text, two game feature cards, and quick links including privacy and an external play button.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled privacy policy page with sections on collected data and policy details using cards and icons.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata file tracking project state, theming changes, requirements, and known issues for the app.
